org.hibernate.ogm.util.parser.impl

Class LikeExpressionToRegExpConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.util.parser.impl.LikeExpressionToRegExpConverter

  • public class LikeExpressionToRegExpConverter
extends Object
    Creates Pattern objects equivalent to given HQL/JPQL LIKE expressions. Used by LikePredicate implementations to emulate LIKE predicates via a native regexp operator.

    The following rules apply for creating regular expressions:

    • the _ wildcard is replaced by . (unless it is escaped)
    • the % wildcard is replaced by .* (unless it is escaped)
    • non-wildcard character sequences are quoted (wrapped by \\Q...\\E) to match them as is
    • escape characters are omitted from the resulting pattern
    • the pattern is wrapped by ^...$ to make sure the entire string is matched
    • the reg exp wildcard . matches line breaks
    Author:
    Gunnar Morling
